 1997-09011997-07-030,  HERITAGE,  PSC,  ,  , 
PrecisREGULATIONS RESPECTING THE APPOINTMENT OF CERTAIN PERSONS IN THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE AND AGRI-FOOD - which exempts certain appointments to term positions at the Horticulture Research and Development Centre and at the Lethbridge Research Centre, made in connection with a collaborative research agreement, from the application of all the provisions of this Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1997-0308 Publication Date: 1997-07-23
Attachments
precis:
REGULATIONS RESPECTING THE APPOINTMENT OF CERTAIN PERSONS IN THE DEPARTMENT
OF AGRICULTURE AND AGRI-FOOD - which exempts certain appointments to term
positions at the Horticulture Research and Development Centre and at the
Lethbridge Research Centre, made in connection with a collaborative
research agreement, from the application of all the provisions of this Act.
